version_description: Small bug fixes.
Small bug fixes.
Small bug fixes.

- New Tools menu to give you more insight and control - check your network health, get notified of issues, test Wi-Fi strength in various areas of your home and more!
- More Help links and Network Notifications for additional troubleshooting and support.
- Quick access to advanced features from the Wi-Fi Management Console.
- General fixes and improvements.

- Updated Home Page – Easily view your network names and passwords.
- New Channel Scan that selects the least congested Wi-Fi Channels.
- Submit your Feedback - Let us know what issues you have or what features you’d like to see in the app.
- More device types – Expanded list helps you more easily identify your devices.
- Network Outage detection – See if there is a network outage in your area.
- General fixes and improvements.

- Learn More & FAQs section provides info on Smart Home Manager features.
- Get notified when new features are available to you.
- General fixes and improvements.

•Get help adding new devices to your network.
•Learn more about your speed plan.
•Get notified if there is Wi-Fi interference in your home.
•General fixes and improvements.
General fixes and improvements.

• Touch ID & Face ID support for easier access!
• Updated device list! Check out your Wi-Fi Gateway details or reboot it on demand.
• Have old devices you don’t want to see anymore? You can now hide devices if they are not connected to your network.
• General fixes and improvements.

• Push notification support – We’ll notify you if there is important info or issues regarding your network.
• General fixes and improvements.
We’re always working to make the Smart Home Manager app better for you. We’ve squashed a few bugs & made some improvements!

We’re always working to make the Smart Home Manager app better for you. We’ve squashed a few bugs & made some improvements! We have implemented a new Wi-Fi Coverage test tool* that uses Augmented Reality to visually depict your Wi-Fi coverage signal strength. Enjoy! *Only available in your Tools menu if you are using a compatible phone and AT&T Wi-Fi Gateway that support Augmented Reality.
You can now view and manage your upcoming appointments and shipments. We’ve also squashed a few bugs & made some improvements. Enjoy!

Check out the new version of Smart Home Manager! We’ve completely redesigned the app and it’s now easier than ever to personalize and manage your home network. We'll respond to your network needs in real-time with troubleshooting tips. You can see who's on your home network, schedule downtime, and more.

Check out the new version of Smart Home Manager! We’ve completely redesigned the app and it’s now easier than ever to personalize and manage your home network. We'll respond to your network needs in real-time with troubleshooting tips. You can see who's on your home network, schedule downtime, and more.

This update allows you to view historical Internet usage on your devices, to see who’s been using the most bandwidth and when. We’ve also provided more troubleshooting options and ways to optimize your home network.
With this release, we’ve fixed some bugs and made improvements, including the addition of device prioritization for select Wi-Fi Gateway models.
With this release, we've added notifications for when new devices join your network. We've also made other improvements and fixed some bugs.

With this release, we've added the ability to choose the duration that you’d like pause a device or profile for Wi-Fi Gateway Models that support those features. We've also made other improvements and fixed some bugs.
With this release, we're introducing a newly-designed, optimized Speed Test experience. It's now easier than ever to check your Wi-Fi speed. We've also made other improvements and squashed some bugs.

With this release, we're introducing device speed test results and tips to improve your device speeds. 
We've also updated the connected devices view, to give you more details and direct access to device actions. 
We've also made other improvements and squashed some bugs.
With this release, we've improved our settings restore function and continued to make general improvements.
This latest release includes experience improvements and design enhancements. We've also squashed some bugs.

This latest release includes enhancements to the equipment setup experience.
We've also made other design improvements as well as some minor fixes.

This latest release includes enhancements to equipment order tracking. 
We've also made other design improvements as well as some minor fixes.
This latest release includes experience improvements and design enhancements. We've also squashed some bugs.
This latest release includes experience improvements and design enhancements. We've also squashed some bugs.

This latest release features the new and improved design of our Virtual Assistant. We’ve also re-branded our enhanced home network security: AT&T Internet Security with ActiveArmor℠, and it’s now available for all Fiber customers.

This release also includes our ongoing experience improvements and design enhancements. With these, we’ve squashed some bugs along the way.
This latest release includes experience improvements and design enhancements. We've also squashed some bugs.

In the latest app update, we've revamped the Virtual Assistant's design and updated some of its functionality. We've also recently updated our enhanced home network security: AT&T Internet Security with ActiveArmor℠. This feature is free, available to all Fiber customers. This release includes ongoing app experience and functionality improvements.
